text:
Hello All! I’m having some troubles trying to add external CSS to my HubL template.
I would like to use something like _`<link rel="stylesheet" href="<https://discover.darwinex.com/hubfs/Darwinex_MKT_local/darwinexMKT/delete/TDC-L01.css>"/>` _for CSS hosted in Files instead of `{{require_css(get_asset_url("../../../css/landings/TDC-L01.css")) }}` hosted in Design Tools, but It does not work… Does someone know how could I use external CSS here? Thanks!
